doc.field: Reuben Fenner habeas corpus writ and affidavit
Reuben Fenner habeas corpus writ and affidavit

This collection consists of an 1814 writ of habeas corpus and affidavit addressed to Lieutenant Colonel Forbes, commander of the 42nd Regiment of the New York State Militia at Fort Lewis in New Utrecht, Kings County, regarding the release of Reuben Fenner, who enlisted under age.

This collection consists of an 1814 writ of habeas corpus and affidavit addressed to Lieutenant Colonel Forbes, commander of the 42nd Regiment of the New York State Militia at Fort Lewis in New Utrecht, Kings County, regarding the release of Reuben Fenner, who enlisted under age.

This collection consists of a writ of habeas corpus and an affidavit addressed to Lieutenant Colonel Forbes, commander of the 42nd Regiment of the New York State Militia at Fort Lewis in New Utrecht, Kings County, regarding the release of Reuben Fenner, who enlisted under age. The documents are dated October 14, 1814.
Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1977.
